pullrequest.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

content.raw:
Those are fair points. The more we break windows, the more we have to fix.

However, we should not delay pull requests like this because of problems that are related, but not within scope.

It's better to move quickly on topics that directly affect our customers and other developers, than hold up development on a feature that doesn't work and has few users.
content.html:
Those are fair points. The more we break windows, the more we have to fix.

However, we should not delay pull requests like this because of problems that are related, but not within scope.

It's better to move quickly on topics that directly affect our customers and other developers, than hold up development on a feature that doesn't work and has few users.
